quotes.message: We must all suffer from one of two pains: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The difference is discipline weighs ounces while regret weighs tons.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Without pain, there would be no suffering, without suffering we would never learn from our mistakes. To make it right, pain and suffering is the key to all windows, without it, there is no way of life.
quotes.name: Angelina Jolie

quotes.message: Pain is temporary. It may last a minute, or an hour, or a day, or a year, but eventually it will subside and something else will take its place. If I quit, however, it lasts forever.
quotes.name: Lance Armstrong

quotes.message: When you can't remember why you're hurt, that's when you're healed.
quotes.name: Jane Fonda

quotes.message: I have learned now that while those who speak about one's miseries usually hurt, those who keep silence hurt more.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: Pain is such an uncomfortable feeling that even a tiny amount of it is enough to ruin every enjoyment.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
quotes.name: Buddhist proverb

quotes.message: Pain is what the world inflicts upon us. Suffering is our emotional reaction when we fail to make the difficult conscious choice to choose Joy.
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: If you aren't in the moment, you are either looking forward to uncertainty, or back to pain and regret.
quotes.name: Jim Carrey

quotes.message: God gave us pain to remind us we are alive, so we will learn to value the joys and beauty of the world.
quotes.name: Tom Corr

quotes.message: Much of your pain is the bitter potion by which the physician within you heals your sick self.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: An hour of pain is as long as a day of pleasure.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: Pain and pleasure like light and darkness, succeed each other.
quotes.name: Lawrence Stone

quotes.message: Pain is immune to empathy...like love.
quotes.name: Barbara Lazear Ascher

quotes.message: Pain is like a love affair. When it’s over it’s over.
quotes.name: Elyse Sommer

quotes.message: People in pain are like the wandering minstrels of the Renaissance. Any occupied space becomes their court. If the story’s told often enough, perhaps the demons will become manifest. Made visible and mastered though words.
quotes.name: Barbara Lazear Ascher

quotes.message: Even pain has its joy.
quotes.name: Russian Proverb

quotes.message: The pain of the little finger is felt by the whole body.
quotes.name: Filipino Proverb

quotes.message: Pain is the only evil I know about. It’s the only one I can fight.
quotes.name: Walter M. Miller

quotes.message: Sometimes pain can drive a man harder than pleasure.
quotes.name: Don Ingalls

quotes.message: He was wise to the ways of pain. He had to be, for he felt none.
quotes.name: James Tiptree

quotes.message: It is our suffering that brings us together. It is not love. Love does not obey the mind, and turns to hate when forced. The bond that binds us is beyond choice. We are brothers. We are brothers in what we share. In pain, which each of us must suffer alone, in hunger, in poverty, in hope, we know our brotherhood.
quotes.name: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.message: The best way of handling pain was to study it objectively.
quotes.name: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.message: Pain can be controlled, you just disconnect it.
quotes.name: James Cameron

quotes.message: Who can remember pain, once it’s over? All that remains of it is a shadow, not in the mind even, in the flesh. Pain larks you, but too deep to see.
quotes.name: Margaret Atwood

quotes.message: Pain is the universe unguarded.
quotes.name: Steve Aylett

quotes.message: Pain is the substance of life and the root of personality, because only suffering is a person.
quotes.name: Miguel de Unamuno y Jugo

quotes.message: There is nothing more suitable for the purposes of the universe than pain; never a day when you suffer is a lost day.
quotes.name: Amado Nervo

quotes.message: Men are more sensitive to pain than to pleasures.
quotes.name: Tito Livio

quotes.message: Top results are achieved only through pain. But eventually you like this pain.
quotes.name: Juha Vaatainen

quotes.message: I’m willing to accept any kind of pain to win a race.
quotes.name: Rick Wohlhutter

quotes.message: The marks humans leave are too often scars.
quotes.name: John Green

quotes.message: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Some old wounds never truly heal, and bleed again at the slightest word.
quotes.name: George R.R. Martin

quotes.message: Wisdom is nothing more than healed pain.
quotes.name: Robert Gary Lee

quotes.message: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: No pain, no palm; no thorns, no throne; no gall, no glory; no cross, no crown.
quotes.name: William Penn

quotes.message: Pain has its own noble joy, when it starts a strong consciousness of life, from a stagnant one.
quotes.name: John Sterling

quotes.message: Pain nourishes courage. You can't be brave if you've only had wonderful things happen to you.
quotes.name: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.message: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: The pain of the mind is worse than the pain of the body.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: There are no gains without pains.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: There is no coming to consciousness without pain.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: One of the greatest pains to human nature is the pain of a new idea.
quotes.name: Walter Bagehot

quotes.message: Out of pain and problems have come the sweetest songs, and the most gripping stories.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Find a place inside where there's joy and the joy will burn out the pain.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: Pain is filtered in a poem so that it becomes finally, in the end, pleasure.
quotes.name: Mark Strand

quotes.message: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.name: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.message: Recovery begins with embracing our pain and taking the risk to share it with others. We do this by joining a group and talking about our pain.
quotes.name: John Bradshaw

quotes.message: Everyone that burns has to learn from the pain.
quotes.name: William Frederick Durst

quotes.message: Joy and pain are like sunshine and rain.
quotes.name: Ronan Keating

quotes.message: Pleasure is the source of pain; pain is the source of pleasure.
quotes.name: Jon R. Stone

quotes.message: Fear is the major ingredient of pain. It is what makes pain hurt.
quotes.name: Josh Bartok

quotes.message: Pain is not the ultimate mode of perfection. It is merely provisional and a protest.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Pain, unlike pleasure, wears no mask.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: Much of your pain is self-chosen.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran
